text: akdhbu walam yanzuruu 'iilaa al'ard alati 'anbatna fiha min kuli nawe hasan nafe min alnbat, la yuqadar ealaa 'inbath 'iilaa raba alealmyn? 'iina fi 'iikhraj alnbat min al'ard ladlalt wadihatan ealaa kamal qudrat allh, wama kan 'akthar alqawm mwmnyn. wa'iina rabak lahu aleaziz ealaa kl mkhlwq, alrahim aldhy wasieat rahmatih kl shy'
